tool_description:
Instant domain search.

Documentation available at https://domainr.com/docs/api
name: Domainr
title: Domainr

api_list.name: /v2/register
api_list.description: Responds with an HTTP redirect to a supporting registrar.

api_list.name: /v2/status
/v2/search
api_list.description: Responds with search suggestions related to the query.

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Optional two-character country code, to include Geo TLDs.

optional_parameters.name: registrar
optional_parameters.description: Optionally restrict returned results to those supported by a registrar.

optional_parameters.name: defaults
optional_parameters.description: Optionally include a comma-separated list of zones to include by default.
